titles.title: Standard DATA Act of 2017
Standard DATA Act of 2017
Standard Data And Technology Advancement Act of 2017
Standard Data And Technology Advancement Act of 2017
To establish consistent requirements for the electronic content and format of data used in the administration of certain human services programs under the Social Security Act.
Standard DATA Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Ways and Means
Referred to House Energy and Commerce
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.
